roleset.name: surprise

example.name: both args
example.text: Tamzin Outhwaite has told of her surprise at hitting the headlines over light-hearted remarks she made about David Beckham.
example.arg: at hitting the headlines over light-hearted remarks she made about David Beckham

example.name: interestingly arranged arg0
example.text: Let 's start with that surprise , the malfeasance that is crossing your desk .
example.arg: the malfeasance that is crossing your desk
example.note: the word 'malfeasance' will always remind me of Dwight Schrute.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on nouns corpus. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1.
